    • getShowByName

      public ResultSet getShowByName(String name)
      getShowByName runs the database query to provide all information on shows on a particular show
      Parameters:
      name - String - the name of show information is requested for
      Returns:
      ResultSet - the information for the requested show

    • getShowByDate

      public ResultSet getShowByDate(String date)

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      ResultSet - the information for the requested date

    • getShowByPerfID

      public ResultSet getShowByPerfID(int performanceID)
      getShowByPerfID runs the database query to provide all information on shows on a particular performance ID // RMT
      Parameters:
      int - eight digit sequence used by the show the information is requested for
      Returns:
      ResultSet - the information for the requested date

    • buyTicket

      public Boolean buyTicket(String fname, String lname, String add_no, String add_st, String post_code, int perfId, int stall, int circle, boolean post)
      buyTicket records a ticket purchase in the database Register the Customer buying the ticket Create a new entry in the ticket table
      Parameters:
      fname - ,lname,add_no,add_st,post_code String - The name, address and phone of the Customer
      perfId - , stall,circle,post int - The details of the tickets purchased @ return bookingMade Boolean - an indication of whether the booking has succeeded

    • createTicket

      public void createTicket(int custID, int perfID, int stall, int circle, boolean post)
      createTicket will create a record if the customer having made a booking
      Parameters:
      custID - int the customer who made the booking
      perfId - int the performance the booking has been made for
      stall - int the number of stall seats booked
      circle - int the number of circle seats booked
      post - boolean indicates whether the tickets are to be posted

    • getTicket

      public ResultSet getTicket(int custID)
      getTicket will get all th stored tickets for a specified customer
      Parameters:
      custID - int - the customerID (from the Customer Database Table)
      Returns:
      ResultSet - all the tickets that customer has purchased

    • updateAvailableSeats

      public boolean updateAvailableSeats(int perfId, int stall, int circle)
      updateAvailableSeats will check that seats are available and will record that any seats booked are no longer available
      Parameters:
      perfId - int the performance the seats are relevant to
      circle - intthe number of circle seats
      stall - in the number of stall seats
      Returns:
      boolean an indication that there are not enough seats for that booking

    • getAvailableSeats

      public ResultSet getAvailableSeats(int perfId)
      getAvailableSeats will retrieve all avaible seats for a given performance
      Parameters:
      perfID - int - the performance required
      Returns:
      ResultSet -all the stored information for that performance , which includes the fields seats_stall and seats_cricle

    • close

      public void close()
      close will close the connection to the current database
